County treasurers not required to pay more than taxes collected. County treasurers shall not be required to pay into the state treasury more state taxes than shall have been actually collected by them in their respective counties. History: L. 1876, ch. 34, § 104; March 11; R.S. 1923, 79-2204. Prev Article 22. - STATE AD VALOREM PROPERTY TAX LEVIES Next 2025. Powered by KLISS. Rendered: 2025-12-31T11:42:52.
